item.title: Market Maker
item.description:
Market Maker

The Orson & Co crew meeting with Sir John Hegarty and the team at The Garage Soho. Sir John shaped many of the most famous ad campaigns, including Audi's famous Vorsprung Durch Technik.

item.title: Steve's Boss
item.description:
Steve's Boss

Talking to Man, Myth, Legend, John Sculley @johnsculley. Inventor of the Pepsi Challenge, Apple CEO, Jeff Daniels lookalike and incredibly nice person at Web Summit 2015 in Dublin.

item.title: 001 - License to Trade
item.description:
001 - License to Trade

Such a pleasure to meet Chinese Aerospace pioneer ￼Philip Carmichael whilst out in Shanghai. He was the 1st Westerner to be granted a Chinese Passport, numbered 001.

item.title: Capital Time
item.description:
Capital Time

The inimitable Julie Meyer with Orson & Co founders Richard Mason and Benjamin Morse at the offices of Ariadne Capital in London.

item.title: FTE 2015
item.description:
FTE 2015

Dinner with Paul Ostergaard CEO of Norwood Systems and Ronan Dunne CEO of O2 at Follow The Entrepreneur 2015.

item.title: Work Rules!: a new book of insights from Google's Laszlo Bock that will transform how you live and lead
item.description:
Work Rules!: a new book of insights from Google's Laszlo Bock that will transform how you live and lead

Read Work Rules!, a new book from Laszlo Bock, Google's SVP of People Operations, aimed at making work suck less.

item.title: Shanghai 2014 Trip
item.description:
Shanghai 2014 Trip

In December 2014 a cohort of 23 Scottish Fellows visited Shanghai to attend a series of visits and seminars across manufacturing, ecommerce and other things.

item.title: IDEO, Silicon Valley's Most Influential Design Firm, Sells A Minority Stake
item.description:
IDEO, Silicon Valley's Most Influential Design Firm, Sells A Minority Stake

In a response to "pendulum swings" in the design landscape, IDEO, the global consultancy known for its human-centered approach, has become part of Kyu Collective, a group of businesses in the creative industry owned by Tokyo-based Hakuhodo DY Holdings.

item.title: Websummit Society Stage
item.description:
Websummit Society Stage

If you don't tell your story, your customers will do it. @CamHunterBell @hereisramji @FunnyBizzSF #WebSummit15
